version.description: The version of this input document

jobs.description: Jobs to submit to the state-machine.

name.description: The name to display for this job.

needs.description: A list of jobs that must be completed before this job can run.

items.description: Name of the job that must be complete.

steps.description: A list of steps to submit to the state-machine for this job. Each step will run sequentially

action.description: The action to be run from the registry in `component.action` format.

inputs.description: The input to supply to this step.

outputs.description: Output that will be used in a future job when building the graph.

dry_run.description: Whether the state-machine should execute this input document or return the changes that would be made if it did. Defaults to true.

timeout.description: How long this input document should wait for completion before aborting. Defaults to no timeout.

refresh.description: Whether the relevant components should be refreshed before executing the input document. Defaults to false.
